Title: "MCP is the new browser?" — Kent C. Dodds x Burke Holland, Live
Author: Visual Studio Code
Description:
A fast, off‑the‑cuff live chat where Kent and Burke unpack why Model Context Protocol (MCP) is a “web browser” moment for AI tools - and why Jarvis doesn't exist, but should because of MCP?

🔎 Chapters: 00:00 We're LIVE 00:20 Welcome Kent 01:35 Where are we at with MCP 06:22 Meet Kody 🐨 08:40 Q&A 24:11 Wrap
